    • preCheck

    • suspend

      public AdvancedScanResultConsumer.ScanResumer suspend()
      Description copied from interface: AdvancedScanResultConsumer.ScanController
      Suspend the scan.

      This means we will stop fetching data in background, i.e., will not call onNext any more before you resume the scan.

      Specified by:
      suspend in interface AdvancedScanResultConsumer.ScanController
      Returns:
      A resumer used to resume the scan later.

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Description copied from interface: AdvancedScanResultConsumer.ScanController
      Terminate the scan.

      This is useful when you have got enough results and want to stop the scan in onNext method, or you want to stop the scan in onHeartbeat method because it has spent too many time.

      Specified by:
      terminate in interface AdvancedScanResultConsumer.ScanController

    • destroy

      Returns:
